PluginData.FriendlyName: Star Wars Imperial Lock On Sound (Mod)
PluginData.Author: Jay und Drang
PluginData.Tooltip: This mod will make the lock on sound a imperial lock on sound effect.
PluginData.Description: Basic mod to change the vanilla lock on sound effects to that of a TIE Fighter as seen in Episode IV. Start up sound, followed by looped search effect, then faster search noise and tone when lock is established.
